full_summary:
==================

# Programmer SW Developer Tender

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029367
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** IC206397

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-21T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-03-13

## Tender Description

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued to acquire Programmer SW Developer services. This tender has been amended and supersedes previous solicitations.

## Tender Objective

Industry Canada seeks a contractor to provide Programmer SW Developer services.

## Tender Criteria

The contractor must demonstrate expertise in software development and have experience working with Industry Canada.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to vendors who have entered into trade agreements with the Government of Canada, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others.

## Procurement Method

This tender is a competitive selective tendering process.

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is Industry Canada.

## Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to contractors operating in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Attachment

Please refer to the attached documents for further information about this tender.

## Contact Information

To inquire about this tender, please contact:

* Heidi Gagne, Industry Canada
* Email: [heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-542-9135

Note: I have corrected some errors in the original text and kept only the most important information. I also rephrased sentences to make them flow better and added some sections to improve the clarity of the tender announcement. The rewritten text is now in a more professional tone and adheres to industry standards for writing government contracts. 

I used markdown formatting to make the text more readable and easier to understand. I also used headings and subheadings to break up the content and make it easier to scan. I kept the most important information at the top and moved less important information to the bottom. I also added a note to explain the changes I made to the original text. 

Please let me know if you need further assistance! 400 words is a lot of text to work with, and I am sure you want me to elaborate further, Please let me know which sections would you like me to expand
